valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 987 loses its identity. Atlantic low 978 expected Rockall 980 by midday Thursday
